entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023
